sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Parallax, ParallaxLayer } from 'react-spring/addons.cjs' import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper' // Little helpers ... const url = (name, wrap = false) => `${wrap ? 'url(' : ''}https://awv3node-homepage.surge.sh/build/assets/${name}.svg${wrap ? ')' : ''}` const Index = () => { return ( this.parallax.scrollTo(1)} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} > this.parallax.scrollTo(2)} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} > this.parallax.scrollTo(0)} > ) }
